data.name: Bootstrapper.AutoUpdateFailed
data.value: Froststrap was unable to automatically update to version {0}. Please update it manually by downloading and running it from the website.

data.name: Bootstrapper.ConfirmLaunch
data.value: Roblox is currently running, and launching another instance will close it. Are you sure you want to continue launching?

data.name: Dialog.Connectivity.RobloxDown
data.value: Roblox may be down right now. See {0} for more information.

data.name: Dialog.Connectivity.BadConnection
data.value: A connection could not be made, which likely indicates a poor internet connection or a firewall block. If your connection is fine, please ensure that your antivirus isn't blocking Froststrap.

data.name: Bootstrapper.FirstRunUninstall
data.value: You must first install Froststrap before uninstalling.

data.name: Bootstrapper.NotEnoughSpace
data.value: Froststrap does not have enough disk space to download and install Roblox. Please free up some disk space and try again.

data.name: Bootstrapper.Status.Starting
data.comment: "Starting Roblox" or "Starting Roblox Studio"

data.name: Bootstrapper.StylePreview.ImageCancel
data.value: Style preview - Click the X button at the top right to close
data.comment: Text for style previews that use an X button. Currently only applies to Byfron

data.name: Bootstrapper.StylePreview.TextCancel
data.value: Style preview - Click Cancel to close
data.comment: Text for style previews that use text button that says "Cancel"

data.name: Bootstrapper.Uninstall.RobloxRunning
data.value: Roblox is currently running, but must be closed before uninstalling Froststrap. Would you like to close Roblox now?

data.name: Bootstrapper.WMFNotFound
data.value: Roblox requires the use of Windows Media Foundation components. You appear to be missing them, likely because you are using an N edition of Windows. Please install them first, and then launch Roblox.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.OldRobloxIcon.Description
data.value: Reverts the Roblox taskbar icon to the monochrome logo used prior to April 2025. Note: This feature is not guaranteed to always work!”

data.name: Menu.Appearance.MenuAdjustment.Description
data.value: Allows you to change the order of the sections on the left side.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.BlockVideoRecording.Description
data.value: Disables the Roblox recording feature. Note: When this feature is enabled, The hotkey combo will no longer work.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.BlockScreenShots.Description
data.value: Disables the Roblox screenshot feature. Note: When this feature is enabled, The hotkey combo will no longer work.

data.name: Menu.Help.Description
data.value: This will provide you with information about fixes and other details (it will redirect you to the wiki page).

data.name: Common.Reset
data.comment: In the context of resetting something to a default value

data.name: ContextMenu.CloseRobloxMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to close Roblox? This will forcefully end the process.

data.name: Dialog.Connectivity.UnableToConnect
data.value: Froststrap is unable to connect to {0}
data.comment: {0} is the name of a service (i.e. Roblox, GitHub)

data.name: Dialog.Exception.Info.1
data.value: An exception occurred while running Froststrap/Bloxstrap

data.name: Dialog.Exception.Info.2
data.value:
Check the [Bloxstrap Wiki]({0}) first to see if this problem has already been addressed with a fix.
If not, then please report this exception through a [GitHub issue]({1}) along with a copy of the log file that was created.

data.name: Bootstrapper.ExtractionFailed.Message
data.value: Some content may be missing. Force a Roblox reinstallation in settings to fix this.

data.name: Bootstrapper.ModificationsFailed.Message
data.value: Not all modifications will be present in the current launch.

data.name: CustomTheme.Errors.DialogAlreadyInitialised
data.value: Custom dialog has already been initialised

data.name: CustomTheme.Errors.TooManyElements
data.value: Custom bootstrappers can only have a maximum of {0} elements, got {1}.

data.name: CustomTheme.Errors.XMLParseFailed
data.value: Failed to parse the theme file: {0}

data.name: CustomTheme.Errors.ElementAttributeParseError
data.value: {0}.{1} could not be parsed into a {2}

data.name: CustomTheme.Editor.Save.Error
data.value: An error occurred while saving your theme.

data.name: CustomTheme.Add.Errors.ZipMissingThemeFile
data.value: Theme file could not be found in the ZIP file

data.name: CustomTheme.Errors.SetupFailed
data.value: Failed to setup custom bootstrapper: {0}. Defaulting to Fluent.

data.name: InstallChecker.Updated
data.value: Froststrap has been upgraded to v{0}

data.name: InstallChecker.VersionDifferentThanInstalled
data.value: The version of Froststrap you've launched is different to the version you currently have installed. Would you like to upgrade your currently installed version?

data.name: Menu.About.Contributors.Description
data.value: These are all of the people who have made notable contributions to Froststrap and Bloxstrap, shaping them into what they are today.

data.name: Menu.About.Version
data.comment: {0} is replaced with the version, i.e. "Version 2.8.0"

data.name: Menu.AlreadyRunning.Caption
data.value: Please note that not all your changes will immediately apply until you close all currently open Roblox instances.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.Bootstrapper.Description
data.value: Customize Froststrap’s bootstrapper using a wide variety of options.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.Customisation.Description
data.value: Configure other miscellaneous customisable bootstrapper options.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.CustomisationIcon.Description
data.value: Must be a multi-size .ico file with sizes 16px to 128px. Set Icon as 'Custom' to use it.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.CustomisationTitle.Description
data.value: The text that shows as the title of the bootstrapper.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.Icon.Description
data.value: Choose what icon Froststrap should use.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.Launcher.Description
data.value: Choose a launch screen style. Note: Dark theme isn’t supported for Legacy or Vista. For more custom launchers, visit the official Bloxstrap Discord server.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.AutoUpdate.Description
data.value: Froststrap will automatically check and update itself when launching Roblox.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.DisableHardwareAcceleration.Description
data.value: Disables hardware acceleration on Frostrap only. Note: You must restart the application in order to see any effects.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.DisableAnimation.Description
data.value: When enabled, it will disable all animations within the app. Requires app restart.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.ConfirmLaunches.Description
data.value: Prevent closures of your existing game when accidentally launching another Roblox Instance.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.ConfirmLaunches.Title
data.value: Prompt to confirm when launching another Roblox instance

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.Description
data.value: Configure what Froststrap should do when launching Roblox.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.ForceRobloxReinstall.Description
data.value: Roblox will be installed fresh on next launch.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.AlreadyExists
data.value: An entry for this flag name already exists.

data.name: Menu.Bootstrapper.CleanUp.Description
data.value: Froststrap will remove old data to save storage space. Note: Feature originally made by Fishstrap.

data.name: Menu.Bootstrapper.Cleaner.Age.Description
data.value: Files older than the set amount will be deleted.

data.name: Menu.Bootstrapper.Cleaner.Logs.Description
data.value: Old log files will be deleted.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.BannerText
data.value: Misusing this can lead to instability or unexpected things happening.
data.comment: The element that this string is rendered in *cannot be wrapped* and may be truncated when displayed if too long. If so, try and paraphrase a shortened version.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.ConflictingImport
data.comment: {0} is a number, {1} is a comma-separated list

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.Description
data.value: Manage your FastFlags here. Check out more features in Advanced Settings

data.name: Menu.CustomMods.Description
data.value: Allows you to install custom mods from the Bootstrapper.

data.name: Menu.AdvancedSettings.SettingsSaved
data.value: Settings saved. You can now close this window

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.InvalidCharacter
data.value: The entry for '{0}' is not valid as the name can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.InvalidJSON
data.comment: {0} is an exception message

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.InvalidPrefix
data.value: The entry for '{0}' is not valid as the name must start with FFlag, DFInt, etc

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.LargeConfig
data.value:
You appear to be importing a very large configuration. You should only be importing configurations that you fully understand. Do NOT blindly paste in configurations made by other people. If you continue, you will very likely end up with stability issues and encounter unexpected changes.
Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.Warning.Header
data.value: Do you know what you are doing?

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.Warning.Text
data.value:
Fast Flags are extremely powerful, being that they are intended to only be used by Roblox engineers. While they can be very useful, manually configuring them can cause serious issues with stability and functionality. Do NOT use the editor if you are unsure of what you are doing.
Do NOT use this to import large "flag lists" made by other people that promise to improve performance or such. They are subject to the aforementioned issues, and they will cause problems for you since you will not be fully aware of what they are changing. If you were about to do that, GO BACK.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Description
data.value: Control how specific Roblox engine parameters and features are configured.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Editor.Description
data.value: Manage your own Fast Flags. Use with caution.
data.comment: Title is Menu.FastFlagEditor.Title

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Help.Description
data.value: Learn more about Fast Flags, what these presets do, and how to use them.
data.comment: Title is Common.Help

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.D3DExclusiveFullscreenInfo
data.value: Configure visual and performance settings for Roblox’s engine.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FixDisplayScaling.Description
data.value: Roblox reduces your rendering quality depending on how your display is scaled in Windows.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FixDisplayScaling.Title
data.value: Preserve rendering quality with display scaling

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FPSLimit.Description
data.value: Set the value to 0 if you want to use Roblox’s native framerate cap.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.HideGuis.Description
data.value: Toggled with [keyboard shortcuts]({0}). Input the ID of a Roblox group you’re in.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.LightingTechnology.Description
data.value: Chosen one will be force enabled in all games. [Beware, may cause lighting issues!]({0})

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.RenderingMode.Description
data.value: Configure the rendering API used for Roblox. Note: Press Alt + Enter to enter exclusive fullscreen when using Direct3D as the rendering API.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.Custom.AutoCloseOnGame
data.value: Auto close when the game closes

data.name: Menu.Appearance_Global.Theme.Description
data.value: Customize Froststrap’s theme to your liking! Make sure to check out our custom themes we have built in!

data.name: Menu.InstallLocation.CantInstall
data.value: Froststrap cannot be installed here. Please choose a different location, or resort to using the default location by clicking the reset button.

data.name: Menu.InstallLocation.NotEmpty
data.comment: {0} is a file path

data.name: Menu.InstallLocation.NotSet
data.value: You must set an install location

data.name: Menu.InstallLocation.NoWritePerms
data.value: Froststrap does not have write access to the install location you've selected. Please choose another location.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.AllowActivityJoining.Description
data.value: Allows for anybody to join the game you're currently in through your Discord profile.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.ShowAccountOnProfile.Description
data.value: Shows the Roblox account you're playing with on your Discord profile.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.Custom.Description
data.value: Here, you can have other programs launch with Roblox automatically.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.Custom.NoneSelected
data.value: No integration selected, please select or add a new one

data.name: Menu.Integrations.Description
data.value: Configure additional functionality to go alongside Roblox.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.DesktopApp.Description
data.value: Roblox will fully close when you leave a game instead of going back to the app. [Will break some things!]({0})

data.name: Menu.Integrations.EnableActivityTracking.Description
data.value: Allows Froststrap to detect what Roblox game you're playing. Certain features may require this.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.RequiresActivityTracking
data.value: This feature requires activity tracking to be enabled and the Discord desktop app to be installed and running. [Find out more]({0}).

data.name: Menu.Integrations.ShowGameActivity.Description
data.value: The Roblox game you're playing will be shown on your Discord profile. [Not working?]({0})

data.name: Menu.Integrations.QueryServerLocation.Description
data.value: When in-game, you'll be able to see where your server is located via [ipinfo.io]({0}).

data.name: Menu.Mods.Description
data.value: Manage and apply file mods to the Roblox Game Client.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Help.Description
data.value: See info about managing and creating mods.
data.comment: Title is Common.Help

data.name: Menu.Mods.Misc.CustomFont.Description
data.value: Font size can be adjusted in the FastFlag Settings tab.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Misc.CustomFont.Invalid
data.value: The file you have chosen does not appear to be a valid font file.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Misc.CustomCursor.Description
data.value: Use your own mouse cursors in Roblox

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.EmojiType.Description
data.value: Choose which type of emoji should Roblox use.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.MouseCursor.Description
data.value: Choose between using two classic Roblox cursor styles.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.OldAvatarEditor.Description
data.value: Bring back the old avatar editor background used in the Roblox app prior to 2020.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.OldCharacterSounds.Description
data.value: An attempt to roughly bring back the character sounds used prior to 2014.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.OldDeathSound.Description
data.value: Bring back the classic 'oof' death sound.

data.name: Menu.MoreInfo
data.value: Click for more information on this option.

data.name: Menu.SettingsSaved.Message
data.value: Changes will take effect the next time you launch Roblox.

data.name: Dialog.LanguageSelector.Subtext
data.value: Choose a language before continuing with installation. Some text might not be translated to preferred language.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.Language.Description
data.value: A relaunch is required for changes to take effect. Some text might not be translated to preferred language.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.ForceRobloxLanguage.Title
data.value: Allow use of unsupported Roblox languages

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.ForceRobloxLanguage.Description
data.value: Only applies to games launched from the Roblox website.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.ForceLogicalProcessor.Description
data.value: Specifies the maximum number of worker threads Roblox can use for parallel tasks. Note: It’s recommended to set this to the number of logical processors your CPU has.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.ForceProcessor.Description
data.value: Specifies the minimum threads kept available for async tasks in the Roblox task scheduler. Note: It is recommended to set the value as the number of cores your CPU has minus one.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.AndroidVfs.Description
data.value: May potentially improve performance on low-end devices only.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.TaskSchedulerAvoidSleep.Description
data.value: Prevents idling in Roblox’s task scheduler, allowing it to run as many tasks as possible.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.MemoryProbing.Description
data.value: Optimizes memory usage for Low-End Systems.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.LightCulling.Description
data.value: Optimizes light rendering conducted by the CPU and GPU by reducing unnecessary light calculations. Note: This setting may cause input lag or delay.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Categories.System.Description
data.value: Configure settings that change how your PC behaves with Roblox.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Categories.SystemExperimental.Description
data.value: Configure Experimental settings that change how your PC behaves with Roblox.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Categories.Network.Description
data.value: Configure network settings to potentially improve performance.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.StartingGraphicLevel.Description
data.value: Sets the initial graphics quality amount when joining a new game.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.OverrideGraphicQuality.Description
data.value: Locks the graphics quality to a selected amount. Note: With this setting enabled, the graphics slider in the Roblox menu will only affect the render distance in a game.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.TextureSkipping.Description
data.value: Textures and icon quality will look worse at higher values. Note: A performance boost may not be guaranteed when using this setting depending on your system.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.ReduceLagSpikes.Description
data.value: Potentially prevent extreme network spikes by smoothing out network output.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.NoPayloadLimit.Description
data.value: Disables Roblox’s network data transfer limit. Note: Enabling this setting could lead to network overhead if the packets being sent are too large. Use at your own risk!

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.RCore.Description
data.value: Potentially improve network performance by applying SignalR optimizations to RCore

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.LargeReplicator.Description
data.value: Improves the speeds of large read and write operations.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FasterLoading.Description
data.value: Decreases wait time by optimizing loading speeds.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.BufferArray.Description
data.value: Controls how much data is temporarily stored before being processed or sent.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.MTU.Description
data.value: Configure the bytes of data that are transferred over your network. Note: Most people can handle MTU sizes from 576–1500.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.DynamicReso.Description
data.value: Sets the pixel resolution in a game. This setting is similar to adjusting video quality on YouTube.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Categories.UserInterface.Description
data.value: Configure the appearance and arrangement of Roblox’s UI.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.ManagerEnabled.Description
data.value: Disabling this will prevent anything configured here from being applied to Roblox.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.MSAA.Description
data.value: Higher MSAA levels reduce jagged edges but may impact performance.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.BypassVulkan.Description
data.value: Overrides the Vulkan GPU support checks to allow unsupported hardware to run on the Vulkan API. Note: This setting may be highly unstable and can cause severe rendering issues!

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.RefreshRate.Description
data.value: Controls the frame rate Roblox should aim for. Recommended to set this value to your monitor’s refresh rate. Default value is 60.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.LowPolyMeshes.Description
data.value: Reduces the quality of polygon meshes to potentially improve rendering performance or reduce memory usage.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Rendering.Description
data.value: Configure experimental settings related to graphics and rendering.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.GraySky.Description
data.value: Sets the sky to gray in certain games. Note: This setting does not affect games that use custom skyboxes.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.NewFPSSystem.Description
data.value: Configures Roblox to use their new beta FPS and frametime system. Enabling this setting may potentially improve frame and input timing.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.UnthemedInstances.Description
data.value: Applies a variety of random colors to text and UI elements that typically lack color. Note: This setting may cause certain games to look strange and discolored.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.SkyColor.Description
data.value: Sets experimental skybox colors using a combination of fast flags. Note: These settings may be unstable, buggy, or incompatible with certain games.”

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.BetterPacketSending.Description
data.value: Makes roblox packet sending as soon as possible. Note: Could lower ping potentially.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.MinimalRendering.Description
data.value: Renders certain terrain and textures at a lower quality, potentially improving performance.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.HidesPurchaseUI.Description
data.value: Disables the game pass purchase GUI in all games.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.WebView2Telemetry.Description
data.value: Note: This setting disables a large majority of Roblox's WebView2 telemetry, but not all.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Pseudolocalization.Description
data.value: Replaces standard Roblox text with a spooky, demonic-style font.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.DisableVoiceChatTelemetry.Description
data.value: Note: This setting disables a large majority of Roblox’s voice chat telemetry, but not all.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.BasicFFlags.Description
data.value: These are very basic fflags. Self explanatory.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagsEditor.AdvancedSettings.ToggleFlagCount.Description
data.value: Toggle the total flag count in the fastflag editor.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagsEditor.AdvancedSettings.AddWithID.Description
data.value: Enable to show 'Add with ID' and 'Import ID JSON' tabs in Add New dialog.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagsEditor.AdvancedSettings.PresetColumn.Description
data.value: Toggle the Preset Column which shows toggleable fflags in fastflag setting

data.name: Menu.FastFlagsEditor.AdvancedSettings.CopyFormat.Description
data.value: Choose the format for copying JSON.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Privacy.Description
data.value: Configure settings that help protect your privacy.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.WhiteSky.Description
data.value: Sets the skybox to white if a custom game skybox is not present.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.RainbowSky.Description
data.value: Sets the skybox to include a variety of colors. Note: Note: Certain icons or images will appear distorted due to Texture Skipping. This setting is not guaranteed to work every time!

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.BlackSky.Description
data.value: Sets the skybox to black. Note: Certain icons or images will appear distorted due to Texture Skipping.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.SmoothTextures.Description
data.value: Smooths almost all in-game textures. Note: Some icons or images may appear distorted due to Texture Skipping. Compatibility or stability is not guaranteed on all systems, as this feature enables the Vulkan rendering API.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Tencent.Description
data.value: Note: This setting blocks some data collection by Tencent and the Chinese government, but not all.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.MoreCharacters.Description
data.value: Repeats letters in most GUI text to expand it. Higher values will increase the effect. Note: Some UI elements may be unaffected.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.NoDisconnectMessage.Description
data.value: Gameplay will freeze until internet connection returns.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.RedFont.Description
data.value: Applies a red color to almost all text. Note: This setting does not work with custom fonts!

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.DisableLayeredClothing.Description
data.value: Removes Roblox’s layered clothing system from rendering on avatars. Note: Enabling this setting potentially may lead to improved performance.

data.name: Menu.Channels.HardwareAccelRestart
data.value: Please restart the app for hardware acceleration to disable and take effect.

data.name: Menu.Channels.DisableAnimationRestart
data.value: Please restart the app for the animations to disable.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Chunks.Description
data.value: Displays the world's chunks in a similar way to Minecraft.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FPSBufferPercentage.Description
data.value: Determines how much extra time Roblox takes to prepare a single frame. Note: Values are set between 0-100

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.RemoveGrass.Description
data.value: Removes Roblox’s default grass textures. Note: This setting does not affect custom grass textures used by individual games.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.WorserParticles.Description
data.value: Reduces the quality of particle effects for potentially better performance.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FullscreenTitlebar.Description
data.value: Prevent the titlebar from showing when you move your cursor to the top of the screen in fullscreen mode.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.TextureQuality.Description
data.value: Adjust the texture quality for games. Note: This setting also affects GUI and UI.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FontPadding.Description
data.value: Default value is 1. Adjust if you use a custom font.

data.name: Dialog.Connectivity.UnableToDownload
data.value: Froststrap is unable to download Roblox

data.name: Dialog.Connectivity.UnableToDownloadReason
data.value: Roblox cannot be downloaded at this time. Please read the following help page for more information: {0}
data.comment: {0} is a URL

data.name: FileTypes.JSONFiles
data.comment: Shown in the open file dialog, where the file type selection dropdown is, e.g. "JSON files (*.json)"

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.InvalidBoolValue
data.value: The entry for '{0}' is not valid as the value must be a boolean (either 'True' or 'False')
data.comment: Do not translate 'True' and 'False', those must stay in English

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.InvalidNumberValue
data.value: The entry for '{0}' is not valid as the value must be a number

data.name: Logger.NoWriteMode
data.value: No log file will be written for this launch because Froststrap is unable to write to the folder at '{0}'

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.InvalidPlaceFilter
data.value: The entry for '{0}' is not valid as the place filter is not formatted correctly.

data.name: Installer.Install.Title
data.comment: Refers to "Install" as a verb

data.name: Installer.Welcome.MainText
data.value:
Thank you for downloading Froststrap.
The only official source to download Froststrap from is {0}, so please verify that you have downloaded it from the official source.
This installation process will be quick and simple, and you will be able to configure all of Froststrap's settings after installation.
data.comment: {0} and {1} are URLs

data.name: Installer.Welcome.UpdateNotice
data.value: You are trying to install version {0} of Froststrap, but the latest version available is {1}. Would you like to download it?

data.name: Installer.Install.Location.Text
data.value: Roblox will also be installed to this path. Change this if you prefer to install all your games to a separate drive. Otherwise, it's recommended that you keep this as it is.

data.name: Installer.Install.Location.DataFound
data.value: Existing data found. Your mods and settings will be restored.

data.name: Installer.Completion.Text
data.value:
Froststrap has successfully been installed.
However, Roblox has not been installed yet. It will be installed when you launch Roblox with Froststrap for the first time. Before installation, you may want to configure Froststrap’s settings first.
Important Note: Do not use the “Roblox Player” shortcut to launch Roblox, as Froststrap will be unable to launch Roblox due to conflicting issues. If you don’t see Froststrap initiating when launching from the Roblox website, simply launch Roblox with Froststrap once from the desktop application to fix this issue.
What would you like to do?

data.name: Installer.Completion.Settings.Description
data.value: View and tweak all of the features and settings Froststrap has to offer

data.name: Installer.Completion.Launch.Description
data.value: Opens Roblox once everything has been installed and configured

data.name: Uninstaller.Text
data.value:
Uninstalling will remove Froststrap from your system, and automatically reconfigure the default Roblox launcher if it's still installed.
If you're uninstalling or reinstalling because you are having issues with Roblox, read [this help page]({0}) first.
The uninstall process may not be able to fully clean up itself, so you may need to manually clean up leftover files where Froststrap was installed.
Froststrap was installed at "{1}".

data.name: Uninstaller.KeepData.Description
data.value: They'll be kept where Froststrap was installed, and will automatically be restored on a reinstall.

data.name: Bootstrapper.WebView2NotFound
data.value: You currently do not have the WebView2 runtime installed. Some Roblox features will not work properly without it, such as the desktop app. Would you like to download it now?

data.name: Dialog.CannotCreateShortcuts
data.value: Froststrap was unable to create shortcuts for the Desktop and Start Menu. Try creating them later through the settings.

data.name: Dialog.Exception.Info.2.Alt
data.value:
Check the [Bloxstrap Wiki]({0}) first to see if this problem has already been addressed with a fix.
If not, then please report this exception to the maintainers of this fork. Do NOT report this to Bloxstrap's GitHub issues, as this is an unoffical build.
data.comment: "fork" in general means "a variation of" or "a different version of". You can alternatively write the first sentence as "...to the maintainers of this version."

data.name: Installer.Install.Shortcuts.Description
data.value: These are general shortcuts that bring up a multi-choice launch Menu. Shortcuts for specific functions can be created later in the settings.

data.name: Menu.Shortcuts.Description
data.value: Configure how Froststrap can be readily launched.

data.name: Menu.Shortcuts.General.Description
data.value: These are the shortcuts that bring up the multi-choice launch Menu.

data.name: Menu.Shortcuts.Function.Description
data.value: Create shortcuts for quick access to specific functions. These will all be placed on the Desktop.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Presets.EmojiType.Error
data.value: The emoji mod can not be applied at this time.

data.name: Dialog.AlreadyRunning.Installer
data.value: Please wait for installation to finish.

data.name: Dialog.AlreadyRunning.Uninstaller
data.value: Please wait for uninstallation to finish.

data.name: About.Licenses.Title
data.comment: Referring to code licenses; see https://opensource.org/licenses for example

data.name: Menu.UnsavedChanges
data.value: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close without saving?

data.name: InstallChecker.VersionLessThanInstalled
data.value: The version of Froststrap you've launched is older than the version you currently have installed. Issues may occur and your settings may be altered. A reinstall is recommended. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.name: Dialog.PlayerError.HelpInformation
data.value:
For information about why this could be happening and how this can be resolved, please read [this help article]({0}).
Check if Roblox works with [the original launcher]({1}). If it doesn't, then this isn't a Froststrap issue. If it does, then refer to the help article.

data.name: Common.NetworkError
data.value: Could not load data because of a network error.

data.name: About.Supporters.Description
data.value: These are the people who've supported Froststrap through Ko-fi. A massive thank you to everyone here! Every person here is ranked by their overall pledge.

data.name: JsonManager.SettingsLoadFailed
data.value: Your Settings could not be loaded. They have been reset to the default configuration.

data.name: JsonManager.FastFlagsLoadFailed
data.value: Your Fast Flags could not be loaded. They have been reset to the default configuration.

data.name: ActivityWatcher.RichPresenceLoadFailed
data.value: Your current game will not show on your Discord presence because an error occurred when loading the game information.

data.name: ContextMenu.GameHistory.Description
data.value: Game history is only recorded for your current Roblox session. Games will appear here as you leave them or teleport within them. Not all servers will be rejoinable.

data.name: ActivityWatcher.LocationQueryFailed
data.value: The server location could not be queried. You may be joining games too quickly.

data.name: Dialog.Connectivity.RobloxUpgradeSkip
data.value: For this launch, Roblox will not be checked for upgrades, and changes to mods will not be applied.

data.name: Dialog.Connectivity.RobloxUpgradeNeeded
data.value: Because Roblox needs to be installed or upgraded, Froststrap cannot continue.

data.name: Installer.Install.CannotOverwrite
data.value:
Froststrap has been installed to this location before and is still present, however the installer cannot overwrite the old executable.
Please manually delete Froststrap.exe from the install location or try restarting your system, and then retry installation afterwards.

data.name: Menu.Mods.Misc.CompatibilitySettings.Description
data.value: Configure application parameters such as DPI scaling behaviour and [fullscreen optimizations]({0}).

data.name: Common.RobloxNotInstalled
data.value: Roblox has not yet been installed. Please launch Roblox using Froststrap at least once before trying to use this option.

data.name: Installer.ShouldCancel
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel the installation?

data.name: Dialog.IconLoadFailed
data.value:
The chosen bootstrapper icon could not be loaded.
{0}
data.comment: {0} is an exception message

data.name: Menu.Shortcuts.ExtractIcons.Description
data.value: Allows you to use Froststrap's range of Roblox icons for your shortcuts. [See how.]({0})

data.name: Dialog.RegistryWriteError
data.value: Froststrap is unable to write to the Windows Registry. An antivirus is likely interfering and causing issues. Please check to make sure there isn't anything that would restrict Froststrap's operation.

data.name: Menu.TestMode
data.comment: See the prompt for more context

data.name: Menu.TestMode.Prompt
data.value:
Test Mode makes it easier to iteratively test how your settings affect Roblox.
While enabled, it will automatically launch Roblox after closing Settings, and reopen Settings after closing Roblox, in a cycle until you disable it.
Would you like to enable Test Mode?

data.name: About.Translators.Description
data.value: All of Froststrap's translations are crowdsourced through [Crowdin]({0}). Everyone listed here are people who generously volunteered their time and effort to help localise Froststrap. A massive thank you to everyone here!

data.name: Common.Navigation.Install
data.comment: The word "Install" is being used as a verb in this instance, like the other navigation button texts of "Next" and "Back"

data.name: LaunchMenu.Discord
data.comment: Call-to-action button

data.name: Paths.Icons
data.comment: Name of the folder that gets created according to the "create shortcut icons" option. Ensure that it is a valid folder name.

data.name: Menu_FlagProfiles_Description
data.value: Save and load fast flag profiles.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.RenameToEurotrucks.Description
data.value: Renames Roblox to "eurotrucks2". Requires [supported graphic card](https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/technologies/ansel/supported-gpus/). This feature is required for shaders.

data.name: Bootstrapper.FilesInUse
data.value:
Froststrap tried to upgrade Roblox but can't because Roblox's files are still in use.
Please close any applications that may be using Roblox's files, and relaunch.
data.comment: This is *not* for when Roblox is still running when trying to upgrade. This applies to files being open (i.e. image assets)

data.name: FileTypes.ZipArchive
data.comment: Shown in the save file dialog, where the file type selection dropdown is, e.g. "Zip archive (*.zip)"

data.name: Common.Export
data.comment: Currently used under the "Froststrap" settings tab for the button to export diagnostic data

data.name: Menu.Channel.Description
data.value: Change deployment and installation settings for Roblox & Froststrap.

data.name: Menu.ChannelChanger.Description
data.value: Sets the deployment channel. Do not change unless you what you’re doing!

data.name: Menu.Channel.RobloxUpgrades.Description
data.value: When disabled, Roblox client won't upgrade to newer versions.

data.name: Menu.Appearance.BootstrapperDownloading.Description
data.value: Change downloading string. {0} is package name, {1} is downloaded packages size and {2} is total size of packages.

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.MultiInstances.Description
data.value: Allows for more than one Roblox instance to be opened simultaneously. May cause issues with desktop app.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Telemetry.Description
data.value: Note: This setting disables a large majority of Roblox's telemetry, but not all.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Chromeui.Description
data.value: When disabled Roblox will use old top bar.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.Categories.IngameMenu.Description
data.value: Debloat the in-game Roblox menu. Note: Keep disabled to remove.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.FlagState.Description
data.value: Show values of specified flags during runtime. Each flag is comma separated.

data.name: Menu.Context.PlayerLogs.Description
data.value: Shows players leaving/joining server you're in.

data.name: Menu.Channel.VersionHash.Desription
data.value: Force Froststrap to download version from specific hash. Please do not change if you have no idea what this does.

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.PingBreakdown.Description
data.value: Sends detailed ping information to the Roblox console.

data.name: Bootstrapper.Dialog.NoUpgradeWithoutClient
data.value: Upgrades were disabled with missing client. To prevent issues upgrading will continue.

data.name: ContextMenu.MessageLogs.Description
data.value: Displays recently sent messages by players.

data.name: Menu.Integrations.PlayerMessageLogs.Description
data.value: Displays player joins/leaves and messages. Only works with [text chat service](https://devforum.roblox.com/t/new-in-experience-text-chat-system-public-release/1848837).

data.name: Menu.Behaviour.AnselBanner
data.value: Ansel support is required for shaders.

data.name: Dialog.Bloxshade.Setting
data.value: Froststrap no longer supports Bloxshade. For more information join Bloxshade discord server.

data.name: Menu.Deployment.Channel.OutOfDate
data.value: This channel is out of date, and is likely no longer being updated. Please use another channel.

data.name: Bootstrapper.Dialog.ChannelOutOfDate
data.value: The channel you're currently on ({0}) is out of date, and appears to no longer be receiving updates.\n Would you like to switch to the default channel ({1})?

data.name: Menu.Channel.ChangeAction.Description
data.value: Roblox or Froststrap may try to change your preferred channel.

data.name: Bootstrapper.Bootstrapper.Dialog.PromptChannelChange
data.value:
Roblox is attempting to set your channel to {0}, however your current preferred channel is {1}.
Would you like to switch your preferred channel to {0}?

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.240FPSWarning
data.value:
Going above 240 FPS is not recommended, as this change may cause issues and worsen performance.
[Click to learn more]({0})

data.name: Menu.FastFlags.Presets.PreferredGPU.Description
data.value: Select the GPU that you want Roblox to use for rendering. Useful if your system has multiple GPUs. Note: This feature also enables DXT support.

data.name: Menu.FastFlagEditor.ExportJson.IncludePresets
data.value: Would you like to include preset FFlags?

data.name: App.OSDeprecation.Win7_81
data.value: Roblox no longer supports Windows 7 or 8.1. To continue playing Roblox, please upgrade to Windows 10 or newer.

data.name: Boostrapper.Dialog.UnauthorizedChannel
data.value: The channel you're currently on ({0}) has now been restricted from public use. You will now be on the default channel ({1}).

data.name: Menu.Channel.Switcher.Fetching
data.value: Fetching latest deploy info, please wait...

data.name: Menu.Channel.Switcher.Unauthorized
data.value: The specified channel either doesn't exist or is private

data.name: Bootstrapper.Dialog.AnselDisabled
data.value: Ansel is not supported. You can no longer use Bloxshade with Froststrap.

data.name: Menu.Froststrap.Description
data.value: Configure options related to Froststrap's behaviour itself.

data.name: Menu.Froststrap.Analytics.Title
data.value: Enable sending of analytics to Froststrap

data.name: Menu.Froststrap.Analytics.Description
data.value: It's anonymous and nothing evil, promise. For insight on what Froststrap collects and why, see Froststrap's [privacy policy]({0}).

data.name: Menu.Froststrap.ExportData.Description
data.value: Gather information that can be uploaded online to troubleshoot a problem you're having.

data.name: Menu.Froststrap.ExportData.ExportConfig
data.comment: Label that appears next to a checkbox

data.name: Menu.Froststrap.ExportData.ExportLogs
data.comment: Label that appears next to a checkbox
